mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM (PROGRAM_NO, USER_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_DAYS, ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_CAPACITY, PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, PROGRAM_CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_PROGRAMNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{programName}, #{programActivityStartDate}, #{programActivityEndDate}, #{activityTime}, #{activityDays}, #{activityLocation}, #{programCapacity}, #{programEnrollEndDate}, #{programContent}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT PROGRAM_NO, USER_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS sdate, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS edate, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_DAYS, SUBSTR(ACTIVITY_LOCATION,3) AS ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_CAPACITY, TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS enroll, PROGRAM_CONTENT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') THEN '모집중' WHEN PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE > SYSDATE THEN '모집중' ELSE '마감' END AS RESULT FROM PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_NO = #{programNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE PROGRAM_NO = #{programNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from request where program_no = #{programNo}
